scripts.start:port: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && npm run start:port:multiple
scripts.network:path: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w ui" "npm run launch:happ:path"
scripts.network:port: func() { concurrently -k -m 2 "npm -w ui run dev -- --port $1" "npm run launch:happ:port $1"; }; func
scripts.launch:happ:port: func() { echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n 1 --ui-port $1 workdir/herddit.happ network mem; }; WEBKIT_DISABLE_COMPOSITING_MODE=1 func
scripts.launch:happ:path: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/herddit.happ -w --ui-path ui/dist network mdns
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
